category.name: Rich Client

preference.name: TC_Fnd0SoaConfigFilterCriteria_AutoCheckinRevisable
preference.preference_description: Activates the automatic check-out/check-in of POM revisable objects whenever needed by Teamcenter. Valid Values: * true: POM revisable objects can be checked-out and then checked-in whenever needed, causing the revision number to increase. This causes changes to be immediately visible to other users (provided they have READ access). If the object is already in a "Private Edit" state beforehand, it will not be checked-in. This is the default value. * false: No check-in is made. Users can accumulate more changes for revisable objects before performing a manual check-in so that to commit all "Private Edit" changes and to publish these changes to other users (provided they have READ access).
